column3: The changes look correct, but according to the guidelines I have to close this (c.f. the section on refactoring https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#refactoring and https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/.github/PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE.md and https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/15465)\n\nGenerally, if the style is not mentioned nor enforced by the developer
